overview: In Mina the artist subtly evokes the death of his grandmother, a tutelary figure who came from Algeria, around whom were woven the ordinary and extraordinary stories and tales that make up the everyday life of the family. Through his practice consisting in collecting anecdotes and testimonies, and by making intimate portraits, Rayane Mcirdi provides a mouthpiece for his family and all those who are little listened to.
title: Mina
